overview:
Lea is in charge of PR and Social Media at tripwolf.com, an online travel guide. tripwolf also offers its content on mobile devices (iPhone and starting mid June 2011 also on Android).

Lea loves traveling, travel writing, photography, design, art, fashion, electronic music and the great outdoors. Read more about that on her personal blog: blog.vanilleah.at

Previous employees included i5invest, 123people.com and i5comm, after graduating with honors in Journalism with a major in Media Management from the University of Applied Sciences in Vienna, Austria. In 2009 she traveled the world solo for 8 months.
